Text: Cast the Widest Net Possible and Save Dear GERALD NEMEC Our most comprehensive search is even better Receive a full off our Enhanced Exhaustive Super Search weve bundled three searches into one Normally retailing at its now available to you for a limited time at only Now you can cast the widest net possible with three powerful searches in one Search our entire network of public record databases plus a statewide Department of Corrections search plus a comprehensive nationwide media search Dont Delay This offer expires Midnight January To start please visitkc Three powerful searches in one Comprehensive Locate Search includes Current address and up to year history with listed phone numbers Relatives roommates and neighbors Bankruptcies tax liens and small claims civil judgments Real property ownership and value Statewide Department of Corrections Search includes Last state of residence searched case number charge period of incarceration Current parole status with parole officer contact information Local and National Media webbased search includes Over Sources including major US newspapers major US magazines trade publications web sites and newswires The Enhanced Exhaustive Super search casts the widest net possible to locate and find out about anyone Go to kc Offer expires January Happy Searching Your friends at US SEARCH You are receiving this email because you opted to receive special offers from US SEARCHcom Do not reply to this email To Unsubscribe Please visit kc IMAGE
